title: NFL ATL: Week 4 'Thursday Night Football' Preview, QB Index
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 4 'Thursday Night Football' Preview, QB Index
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling keep you updated with all the headlines around the league going into Week 4 and break down the “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the San Francisco 49ers and St. Louis Rams. The crew also dissects Rosenthal’s quarterback index. Don’t miss our romantic version of Brett Favre’s agent’s statement about his client. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
